body.name: EGOHOME 12 Inch Queen Mattress, Copper Gel Cooling Memory Foam Mattress for Back Pain Relief,Therapeutic Double Matress Bed in a Box, CertiPUR-US Certified, 60”x80”x12”, Black
features: Matress for All Sleep Positions: This matress is now an all-foam build for a medium-firm feel, Cooling Gel Memory Foam Mattress is a comfortable middle ground that fits all sleepers and sleep positions, designed to extend coolness to ensure a cooler night’s sleep.

Graphene Technology Cover: Nylon-feel cover is deodorizing and has antistatic qualities. Therapeutic properties from its far infrared fabric promote blood circulation. Cooper gel memory foam regulates moisture, odor, and temperature, which can ensure your mattress stays dry and breathable.

CertiPUR-US Certification: Our mattress is proudly made in USA, and crafted for safety, durability, performance, emissions, and content, received the International Chiropractors Association’s endorsement, and can help people achieve a healthier sleep life. Our memory foam and fabrics have been independently safety evaluated to comply with all applicable mandatory and voluntary safety standards for mattress products.

Mattress in a Box Delivery: Your Mattress will be compressed, rolled, and in a compact box for easy delivery and setup. Wait 2 hours for your mattress to fully expand to its original shape. Owning a new Mattress has never been so easy!

Worry-Free 10-Year Limited Warranty Included: We believe that you will love this sleep item and are dedicated to giving you the best night of sleep through our superior products. If your mattress is defective or damaged during delivery, our U.S.-based customer support team will happily work with you to address any concerns to make it right. Please note that THERE IS NO TRIAL PERIOD, OPENED MATTRESSES CANNOT BE RETURNED.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this matress twice. I looked at the reviews and seen people with back issues seemed to be satisfied. I searched reviews on several mattress's and decided on this one. My teen daughter had fossa decompression surgery due to chiari1 she has been in pain for years. Had nerve damage, spinal cord issues and scoliosis. She could never sleep comfortably. She was seeing pain management doctors, neurologists, orthopedics, chiropractors and more. This mattress has been a blessing. She has not complained of a restless night since the purchase. I then purchased the matress for my son and daughter in-law. She was pregnant and he has back issues. They were sleeping on their couches because their mattress springs made it impossible to sleep. They are so happy with this mattress and said it's the best sleep they ever had. I 100% recommend this mattress, buying one for myself. The price is actually great for the superb quality. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just received the mattress several days earlier than estimated. It was easy to unwrap and fully expanded within about an hour or two.No idea what people are talking about with it having a smell, I don’t smell anything funky unless I put my nose right into the mattress. Even then, it’s just that ‘new from a factory’ odor.I’m surprised at how comfortable it is. While firm, it’s also very soft supportive. I’m excited to see how it performs over the next few weeks. Will update later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Might feel firm at first, but when you actually sleep, you'll slowly sink in
reviews.reviewText: Don't give up on this mattress!The firmness is a farce! It's actually quite soft and you'll slowly sink into it, you'll hardly notice that you are, even my dogs love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have horrible sciatica. It's to the point I could barely walk . I bought this mattress in King size. It's top notch quality and very comfortable. However I have memory mattress in my camper. So I knew about the firmness. You have to give yourself a week to adjust. I replaced an expensive Sealy Crown Jewel. Best thing I ever did. Great nights rest for someone that never sleeps. I love no more pain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s so comfortable! This is our 2nd one! And it feels good and no back problems for me or my husband. We’re not even using a topper or any additional products with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you suffer from night sweats, menopause or just being hot while you sleep. This is the perfect mattress for you. It’s so cooling. Keeps from having personal summers from while going through menopause. I sleep longer than 2 hours. And a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft with firmness.
reviews.reviewText: I was very picky reading reviews and descriptions on different beds. We had a Tuft & Needle previously that we got for good price when they were new and upcoming. After ordering this and trying out for a few weeks I found I like this one better. I was afraid it would not be firm enough for me, but still comfortable. Some mornings you just don't want to get out of bed because it feels so good. I would highly recommend this one. I'm not sure how much it really gives pain relief, but I'm still giving it a 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this freaking mattress
reviews.reviewText: So I looked for about a week for a mattress & ended up buying a hybrid. Thought it seemed comfortable at first but then I started waking up with a lot of pain & was having sleepless nights. So I ordered this one & let me tell you it is heaven. It is the most comfortable bed I’ve laid on in a while. Your body literally molds to the mattress. Like the minute I laid on it I felt like I was in heaven it was that “ ahhhh I’m ready for bed” feeling. Best thing I’ve bought in a while “ SWIPE YOUR CARD”
